name: camouflage
flavor_text: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.
effect_text_extend:
User's type changes according to the terrain.

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Building       | normal
Cave           | rock
Desert         | ground
Grass          | grass
Mountain       | rock
Ocean          | water
Pond           | water
Road           | ground
Snow           | ice
Tall grass     | grass

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Courtyard      | normal
Crystal        | rock
Gateway        | water
Magma          | rock
Main Street    | normal
Neon           | normal
Stargazer      | rock
Sunny Park     | grass
Sunset         | ground
Waterfall      | grass
effect_text_simple: User's type changes to match the terrain.
